text: Bosnia and Herzegovina competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Bosnia and Herzegovina entered four swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Mihajlo Čeprkalo |align=left|50 m butterfly |24.59 |47 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m butterfly |53.52 |31 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|Marko Kovačić |align=left|200 m freestyle |1:51.78 |45 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=3|Emir Muratović |align=left|50 m freestyle |22.56 |=34 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m freestyle |49.59 |=35 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m backstroke |25.95 |=37 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Amina Kajtaz |align=left|100 m butterfly |59.08 |22 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m butterfly |2:13.70 |23 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Bosnia and Herzegovina sport
title: Bosnia and Herzegovina at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
